titlestmt.subtitle: Papers of Minnie Bell (Alexander) Mitchell, John Fowler Mitchell, and Elise D. Mitchell at the Lilly Library, Indiana University, Bloomington, Indiana
titlestmt.author: Electronic finding aid encoded by Indiana University Libraries.

change.item: Edits and rearrangement of content into requisite Lilly EAD structure, including addition of abstract, bioghist, scopecontent, controlaccess, relatedmaterial, and c01 levels of container list. Haley Suby.
Batch update to change subject links.

did.abstract: The Mitchell, M.B. mss. are letters, 1939-1949, relating to James Whitcomb Riley and his family, written by Mrs. Minnie Bell (Alexander) Mitchell, author and friend of James Whitcomb Riley.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.
Many collections are housed offsite; retrieval requires advance notice. Please make an appointment a minimum of one week in advance of your visit.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Mrs. Minnie Bell (Alexander) Mitchell, (Mrs. John Fowler Mitchell), 1860-1956, was an author and friend of James Whitcomb Riley. Her son John Fowler Mitchell, 1883-?, was an editor.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The Mitchell, M.B. mss. are letters, 1939-1949, relating to James Whitcomb Riley and his family, written by Mrs. Minnie Bell (Alexander) Mitchell, (Mrs. John Fowler Mitchell), 1860-1956, author and friend of James Whitcomb Riley; her son John Fowler Mitchell, 1883- , editor; and his wife, Mrs. Elsie D. Mitchell, all from Greenfield, Indiana, to Mrs. Jesse T. Johnson of Columbus, Indiana.
The collection also contains newspaper and magazine clippings relating to Mrs. Minnie Bell (Alexander) Mitchell.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Removed from Mrs. Mitchell's James Whitcomb Riley as I Knew Him...Greenfield, Ind., The Old Swimin' Hole Press, 1949 (Lilly PS2706 .M68). 1964.

userestrict.head: Usage Restrictions
userestrict.p: Photography and digitization may be restricted for some collections. Copyright restrictions may apply. Before publishing, researchers are responsible for securing permission from all applicable rights holders, then filling out the Permission to Publish form.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item], Mitchell, M.B. mss., Lilly Library, Indiana University, Bloomington, Indiana.
